snippet.title: The Legend of Zelda - Oracle of Life Online (Trailer 2)
snippet.description:
This trailer was produced sometime in July of 2006 for Z3, an event hosted by Zelda Fan Game Central (zfgc.com). Around that time, bosses were added, an enemy, more classes, and improvements to the PvP system. If you're curious about any details regarding this game, I am more than willing to answer. Simply send me a PM! =)

Credits: 
AoDC - Project Lead/Design/Programmer 
HoF - Design/Mapper/Story
Yue - Sprites 
Kren - Sprites 
gm112 - Server / Development

There were many, many others who have helped out with the project. 

It's been too long for me to remember.

Source released: https://gd-u.com/files/Resources/OOL.7z

P.S. I do apologize for the out of place music. The original was Bob Marley's "Dont Worry, Be Happy" if anyone is interested in syncing this up to the original.
